plugins.name: The Ultimate Table
plugins.description:
The Ultimate Table is a powerful Figma plugin that enables you to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.


Features

  1. Rearrange, remove, add, or duplicate columns and rows
  2. Drag to adjust column widths in header cells
  3. Automatic row height adjustment based on content
  4. Maintain linked tables across your design


Styling Options

  1. Customizable padding, margins, and borders
  2. Column text alignment controls
  3. Zebra striping support
  4. Header styling with sort/filter/search indicators
  5. Custom border radius
  6. Flexible font and size options


Smart Updates

  1. Master table controls for consistent styling


Need a quick start?

  1. Learn all there is to know in less than 10 minutes in this video tutorial
  2. Complete tutorial (Written & Video) at ultimate-table.com
plugins.tagline: Finally a plugin to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.

plugins.name: Components to Section
plugins.description:
Easily regroup all your master components into a section. Runs across all pages of your file

Plugin does not have UI to run.


How to use

Launch via cmd + / or go to plugin > Component to Section

Tab and choose

  1. Run on current page
  2. Run on all pages
  3. Set preferences


Preferences (User saved)

  1. Choose where to create the section (current page or new page)
  2. Choose the spacing between regrouped components


Why paid?

I'm a hobbyist and it's very difficult to write clean efficient code.

I have a day job and it's a good way to keep me motivated and work extra hours.

$2 is the cheapest a plugin can be sold on figma, I was happy with $0.99 but hey...


If this plugin starts selling regularly I will keep adding commands to make it even more powerful


Free stuff

If you are looking for free stuff, I have published two widget and they are currently used by more than 50K users


Help out ?

I'm in the London, UK and always keen to hear about fellow hackers, If you want to contribute to the plugin or have a suggestion feel free to contact me on edwardbattistini.com/contact

accepted.name: EdwardB
accepted.description: Product designer during the day. Super dad at night

plugins.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to quickly create Figma elements by inputting JSON data, improving workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Generate Figma elements through JSON input
  2. Multi-language user interface support
  3. Compatible with multi-layered frame structures
  4. Can be used together with the plugin Export Frame JSON Pro for seamless frame export and import.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin interface and select the appropriate language.
  2. Enter or paste valid JSON data into the JSON input field.
  3. Click the “Submit JSON” button, and the plugin will generate corresponding Figma elements based on the input data.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure the JSON data is correctly formatted, or elements may not be generated properly.
  2. This plugin can be used together with Export Frame JSON Pro for quick frame import and export.


介绍

本插件允许用户通过输入 JSON 数据，快速生成 Figma 画板中的元素，提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 通过 JSON 输入生成 Figma 元素
  2. 支持多种语言的用户界面
  3. 兼容画板的多层次结构
  4. 支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件配合使用，轻松实现画板导出与导入的无缝对接。


使用方法

  1. 打开插件界面，选择适合的语言。
  2. 在 JSON 输入框中输入或粘贴有效的 JSON 数据。
  3. 点击“提交 JSON”按钮，插件将根据输入的数据生成对应的 Figma 元素。


注意事项

  1. 确保输入的 JSON 数据格式正确，否则可能无法生成元素。
  2. 该插件支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件一起使用，实现画板的快速导入导出。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily create Figma frames from JSON data input.

plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: 路径文字 Path Text Aligner
plugins.description:
Introduction

Path Text Aligner is a Figma plugin that allows users to easily align text along any custom path, providing more flexibility and control over text placement in your design.


Function Description

  1. Aligns selected text to any vector path or shape.
  2. Adjusts text along curves, straight lines, and complex paths.
  3. Offers controls for offset and spacing to fine-tune text positioning.
  4. Supports multi-line text alignment along a path.


How to Use

  1. Select the text you want to align.
  2. Draw or select the path you want the text to follow.
  3. Run the plugin, and the text will automatically align to the path.
  4. Adjust settings for text spacing, direction, and offset to achieve the desired effect.


Notes

  1. This plugin works best with vector paths (e.g., lines or shapes).
  2. Ensure the text layer is not grouped with other objects for proper alignment.
  3. You may need to adjust font size or path curvature for optimal results.


介绍

路径文字（Path Text Aligner）是一个Figma插件，允许用户轻松地将文字沿自定义路径对齐，在设计中提供更多的灵活性和控制。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文字沿任意矢量路径或形状对齐。
  2. 支持文本在曲线、直线及复杂路径上的对齐。
  3. 提供偏移和间距控制，以微调文本的位置。
  4. 支持沿路径对齐多行文本。


使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。
  2. 绘制或选择要让文字跟随的路径。
  3. 启动插件，文字将自动沿路径对齐。
  4. 调整文本间距、方向和偏移设置，以获得理想效果。


注意事项

  1. 此插件适用于矢量路径（例如，线条或形状）。
  2. 请确保文字图层未与其他对象组合，以确保正确对齐。
  3. 根据路径曲率和字体大小调整设置，以获得最佳效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Align text along any path with ease in Figma.

plugins.name: 画板自动编号 Auto Artboard Numbering
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin automates the numbering of selected Figma artboards, allowing you to customize the naming sequence with prefixes and suffixes. It supports multiple languages, enhancing your workflow efficiency and organization.


Function Introduction

  1. Automatically numbers selected artboards in Figma.
  2. Customizable naming with prefixes and suffixes.
  3. Supports multiple languages.
  4. Two naming sequences: left-to-right then top-to-bottom, or top-to-bottom then left-to-right.


How to Use

  1. Select the artboards you want to rename.
  2. Choose your preferred naming sequence.
  3. Optionally, add a prefix or suffix.
  4. Click "Apply Naming" to rename the selected artboards.


Notes

  1. Ensure artboards are selected before applying the naming operation.
  2. The plugin temporarily disables the apply button for 2 seconds to prevent accidental multiple clicks.


介绍

本插件自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号，支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名顺序。支持多种语言，提升您的工作效率和画板管理。


功能说明

  1. 自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号。
  2. 支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名。
  3. 支持多种语言。
  4. 两种命名顺序：从左到右再从上到下，或从上到下再从左到右。


使用方法

  1. 选择需要重新命名的画板。
  2. 选择您喜欢的命名顺序。
  3. 可选地添加前缀或后缀。
  4. 点击“应用命名”重新命名选中的画板。


注意事项

  1. 请确保在应用命名操作前已选中画板。
  2. 插件会在2秒内暂时禁用应用按钮，以防止意外的多次点击。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Automate artboard numbering with custom prefixes, suffixes, and multi-language support in Figma.

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
plugins.description:
CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.


✨ Easily write new content from scratch.

🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.

⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.


Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!


How to Use

  1. Choose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.
  2. Enter your API key for the selected model.
  3. Select a text layer in your Figma file.
  4. Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.
  5. Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.


Get Gemini API Key

Get ChatGPT API Key
plugins.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

plugins.name: Iconize
plugins.description:
Transform any Figma design into a complete set of perfectly scaled Chrome extension icons in seconds.


Benefits:

  1. Save hours of manual work - No more tedious resizing and exporting
  2. Perfect proportions - Maintains design integrity across all sizes
  3. Professional results - Vector paths, text, and effects scale beautifully
  4. Chrome extension ready - Standard sizes (16px, 24px, 36px, 48px, 128px)
  5. Batch processing - Handle multiple designs simultaneously


How to use:

  1. Select your design - Choose any frame, group, component, or instance
  2. Run Iconize - Go to Plugins → Iconize → Scale to Icon Sizes
  3. Get your icons - Five perfectly scaled versions appear instantly
  4. Export to PNG / SVG and use - Icons are named icon16, icon24, icon36, icon48, icon128


Perfect for Chrome extensions, web apps, mobile apps, and any project requiring multiple icon sizes. Works with complex designs including vectors, text, effects, and nested elements.

accepted.name: George Valdes
accepted.description:

plugins.tagline: Instantly generate size appropriate icons at 16px, 24px, 36px, 48px & 128px from any design

plugins.name: Frame Select Helper
plugins.description:
Supports repeatedly selecting the same group of frames by adding a mark (frame name suffix) to the selected frames.


If you copy and paste the selected frames from this tool onto another page, you can export only the targeted frames to a single PDF file by clicking “File” -> “Export frames to PDF”!


選択したフレームにマーク（フレーム名の接尾辞）を付けて、繰り返し同じフレーム群を選択することをサポートします。

このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます。


使い方

初回：選択対象にしたいフレームをマークする


Figmaのフレーム名に`--sfh-target`を付与する

これは手動で、またはフレームを選択した状態でプラグインを起動して"選択フレームを対象にマーク"を押すことで行う


2回目以降：フレームを一括選択する

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. "すべて選択・解除"を押すと、マークしたフレームがすべて選択される


このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます
plugins.tagline: Selection helper for those who want to repeatedly select the same frame for PDF export, etc.

plugins.name: Radix color palette
plugins.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

plugins.name: ProtoFlow – Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
💡 Cos'è ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow è un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non è accessibile


🚀 Come funziona


Seleziona uno o più frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca “Scarica prototipo”.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all’utilizzo


🧠 Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un’intera schermata può essere interattiva.


📦 Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

plugins.name: DeepL Translator
plugins.description:
DeepL Translator


A Figma plugin that quickly translates text within frames using the DeepL API.

The acceleration feature enables faster translations and cost savings.


Features


  1. 🚀 Fast Translation: Re-use past translation history for fast fast translation
  2. 💰️ Cost Saving: Save API Usage by Re-use past translation history
  3. 🌐 Multi-language Support: Supports 29 languages
  4. 📚 Glossary Support: Use DeepL glossaries for consistent translations
  5. 🌍 Auto Detection: Automatic source language detection
  6. 📝 Non-destructive: Creates new frames for translations while preserving originals
  7. 🎯 Simple Operation: Just select languages and click translate


How to Use


  1. Get a DeepL API key (see below)
  2. Select a frame containing text to translate
  3. Choose source and target languages
  4. (Optional) Select a glossary
  5. Click "Translate"
  6. Translation results appear in a new frame


Getting a DeepL API Key


1. Sign up for a DeepL account at DeepL Pro

  1. Free plan available (500,000 characters/month)
  2. Pro plan available for more usage

2. Get your API key:

  1. Log in to your DeepL account
  2. Go to "Account" → "API keys"
  3. Copy your API key

3. Enter your API key in the plugin settings


Supported Languages


See the complete list of supported languages for details.


Major languages include:


  1. English (EN)
  2. Chinese (ZH)
  3. Korean (KO)
  4. German (DE)
  5. French (FR)
  6. Spanish (ES)
  7. Italian (IT)
  8. Dutch (NL)
  9. Japanese (JA)
  10. Portuguese (PT)
  11. Russian (RU)


And 18 more languages


Notes


  1. DeepL API key required (available with free plan)
  2. Free plan includes 500,000 characters per month
  3. Source language must be specified when using glossaries
  4. API keys are securely encrypted and stored


Support & Feedback


We welcome your feedback! Please contact to developer through:


- Contact Form for:

  1. Questions & Inquiries
  2. Feature Requests
  3. Bug Reports
  4. General Feedback


Privacy

  1. DeepL API keys are securely encrypted
  2. Translation data is processed on DeepL servers and not stored
plugins.tagline: Translate texts in Figma by DeepL

  2. Select a frame containing text to translate
  3. Choose source and target languages
  4. (Optional) Select a glossary
  5. Click "Translate"
  6. Translation results appear in a new frame


Getting a DeepL API Key


1. Sign up for a DeepL account at DeepL Pro

  1. Free plan available (500,000 characters/month)
  2. Pro plan available for more usage

2. Get your API key:

  1. Log in to your DeepL account
  2. Go to "Account" → "API keys"
  3. Copy your API key

3. Enter your API key in the plugin settings


Supported Languages


See the complete list of supported languages for details.


Major languages include:


  1. English (EN)
  2. Chinese (ZH)
  3. Korean (KO)
  4. German (DE)
  5. French (FR)
  6. Spanish (ES)
  7. Italian (IT)
  8. Dutch (NL)
  9. Japanese (JA)
  10. Portuguese (PT)
  11. Russian (RU)


And 18 more languages


Notes


  1. DeepL API key required (available with free plan)
  2. Free plan includes 500,000 characters per month
  3. Source language must be specified when using glossaries
  4. API keys are securely encrypted and stored


Support & Feedback


We welcome your feedback! Please contact to developer through:


- Contact Form for:

  1. Questions & Inquiries
  2. Feature Requests
  3. Bug Reports
  4. General Feedback


Privacy

  1. DeepL API keys are securely encrypted
  2. Translation data is processed on DeepL servers and not stored

plugins.name: Riido
plugins.description:
디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업


피그마와 뤼이도를 연동해 디자이너와 개발자의 작업 흐름을 자연스럽게 연결하세요.

디자이너는 더 이상 뤼이도에 직접 들어가 작업 상태를 수정할 필요 없이, 피그마에서 디자인 작업만 해도 자동으로 뤼이도에 최신 상태가 반영됩니다.

개발자는 언제 어떤 디자인이 완료되었는지 실시간으로 확인할 수 있어, 놓치지 않고 바로 개발을 시작할 수 있습니다.


주요 기능


🔗 Figma 디자인과 작업을 연결

작업과 연결된 프레임, 섹션, 페이지를 플러그인에서 바로 확인할 수 있습니다.

연결된 작업을 클릭하면 해당 디자인으로 이동할 수 있어 맥락 파악이 쉬워집니다.


🔄 Figma에서 바로 작업 상태 업데이트

디자인이 완료되면, Figma 안에서 작업 상태를 ‘완료’로 변경할 수 있어 매번 뤼이도에 접속하지 않아도 됩니다.


🧭 작업 히스토리와 현재 상태 추적

플러그인 안에서 작업 목록, 상태, 담당자, 우선순위 등을 한눈에 확인할 수 있어,

디자인과 개발 간에 엇갈림 없이 협업할 수 있습니다


뤼이도와 피그마의 유기적인 연결로

더 빠른 작업 전달, 더 적은 커뮤니케이션 비용, 더 집중된 업무를 경험해보세요.
plugins.tagline: 디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업

plugins.name: Name Shame
plugins.description:
Name Shame is a lovingly vibe-coded plugin born from one designer’s deep-seated frustration with default layer names like “Rectangle 123” and “Group 87.” Instead of silently suffering, I decided to roast my own poor file hygiene—and now yours too.


This plugin scans your Figma file for default-named layers, serves up a spicy roast for each offender, and lets you rename them with beautifully ridiculous alternatives like “such_lazy” or “identity_crisis.” Use it for laughs, use it for cleanup, use it because your future self deserves better.


File hygiene matters. Might as well make it fun. 🎉

accepted.name: Aaron May
accepted.description:
Professional & Punchy
Creative Director with a love for design systems, clear UI, and a well-organized layer panel.

plugins.tagline: Scans bland layer names, dishes witty roasts and renames them with delightful absurdity

plugins.name: BrowserLens
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you import color styles from the BrowserLens web extension. Insert colors as layers in your design and add palettes to your local styles.


Learn more about BrowserLens: https://browserlens.com/

Documentation: https://docs.browserlens.com/


How to Use

  1. Open any webpage with the BrowserLens extension.
  2. Click export > Figma (BrowserLens Plugin).
  3. Download the style file for Figma.
  4. Run this plugin and upload the style file.
  5. Choose whether to add colors as local styles.
  6. Click 'Import Styles'.


About BrowserLens


BrowserLens is a web extension designed to extract styling and seo information from any webpage without the need for developer tools. It provides a simple UI for extracting and copying webpage information from the current tab.


Extension Features

  1. ⌨️ View fonts used on a webpage and the associated CSS values.
  2. 🖌️ Extract colors from a webpage and click to copy color value.
  3. 🌅 Extract gradients from a webpage and click to copy CSS value.
  4. 🎨 Export color palettes to Figma.
  5. 🌐 Preview SEO data including page meta, OpenGraph tags and Twitter Card data.
  6. ✅ Check SEO meta for best practices including title and description length.
  7. 🖼️ List all images present on a page and click to download, including background images.
  8. 🌃 Dark mode support.
